body:
Hi,

I was trying to compile some programs (libgd and parmgridgen) and at some point in their installation, they both require pkg-config-0.29.2.

My problem is, pkg-config fails to build (the log file is attached).

Can anyone reproduce this issue and does it have a known solution?
My system is running macOS Sierra.

[spack-build.txt](https://github.com/LLNL/spack/files/1078537/spack-build.txt)
title: pkg-config fails to build on macOS
